DOC.brief_summary: The investigators will add weekly cetuximab (c225) to the standard care of chemoradiation against locoregionally advanced Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma (NPC), and evaluate the toxicity and efficacy of this new regimen.
DOC.brief_title: Chemoradiation Plus Weekly c225 Against Locoregionally Advanced Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma (NPC)
